issue.title: [FCD] Allow recycling of pointers after undeclare_no_pointers

discussion.p: The precondition to calling declare_no_pointers is that no bytes in the range "have been previously registered" with this call. As written, this precondition includes bytes in ranges, even after they have been explicitly unregistered with a later call to undeclare_no_pointers.

resolution.blockquote: void declare_no_pointers(char *p, size_t n); 9 Requires: No bytes in the specified range have been previously registeredare currently registered with declare_no_pointers().
